title: Market Price Prediction using MLflow
features: Designed and executed end-to-end market price prediction pipeline with MLflow, automating model training, hyperparameter tuning, and artifact logging across 3+ production‑ready models.
Performed comprehensive EDA (univariate, bivariate, multivariate) on the AmesHousing dataset, uncovering key predictors and engineering features that boosted model R² by 12%.

Implemented scalable, modular architecture using factory, strategy, and template design patterns, enabling seamless integration of new algorithms and rapid experimentation while reducing code duplication by 30%.
